languages.text: Омниссия приглядывал за ними в этот день — каждый заряд добрался до цели. Вознеся молитвы Богу-Машине, техножрецы активировали запалы, принеся себя в жертву. Смерть могучего крейсера, вероятно, было видно с орбиты.

traits.locale_text: Не иначе как Омниссия приглядывал за ними в этот день — каждый заряд добрался до цели. Вознеся молитвы Богу-Машине, техножрецы активировали запалы, принеся себя в жертву. Смерть могучего крейсера, должно быть, было видно с орбиты.

languages.text: The Omnissiah watched over them that day — every charge reached its target. The Tech-Priests offered prayers to the Machine God as they activated the charges in their final act of sacrifice. I imagine one could see the death of the mighty cruiser from orbit with the naked eye.
languages.original_text: Омниссия приглядывал за ними в этот день — каждый заряд добрался до цели. Вознеся молитвы Богу-Машине, техножрецы активировали запалы, принеся себя в жертву. Смерть могучего крейсера, вероятно, было видно с орбиты.

traits.locale_text: The Omnissiah watched over them that day — every charge reached its destination. The Tech-Priests offered prayers to the Machine God as they activated the charges in their final act of sacrifice. I imagine one could see the death of the mighty cruiser from orbit with the naked eye.

The Omnissiah watched over them that day — every charge reached its destination. The Tech-Priests offered prayers to the Machine God as they activated the charges in their final act of sacrifice. I imagine one could see the death of the mighty cruiser from orbit with the naked eye.

The Omnissiah watched over them that day — every charge reached its destination. The Tech-Priests offered prayers to the Machine God as they activated the charges in their final act of sacrifice. I imagine one could see the death of the mighty cruiser from orbit with the naked eye.

The Omnissiah watched over them that day — every charge reached its target. The Tech-Priests offered prayers to the Machine God as they activated the charges in their final act of sacrifice. I imagine one could see the death of the mighty cruiser from orbit with the naked eye.

The Omnissiah watched over them that day — every charge reached its target. The Tech-Priests offered prayers to the Machine God as they activated the charges in their final act of sacrifice. I imagine one could see the death of the mighty cruiser from orbit with the naked eye.

languages.text: 那一天，欧姆尼塞亚庇佑了祂的信徒们，每颗炸弹都顺利运达了目标处。技术神甫们向万机之神献上了祈祷，在至高的献祭之中引爆了炸弹。那艘巨型舰船的毁灭过程，就算是在星轨上，用肉眼来看，恐怕也能看得很清楚吧。
languages.original_text: The Omnissiah watched over them that day — every charge reached its target. The Tech-Priests offered prayers to the Machine God as they activated the charges in their final act of sacrifice. I imagine one could see the death of the mighty cruiser from orbit with the naked eye.

traits.locale_text: 那一天，欧姆尼塞亚庇佑了祂的信徒们，每颗炸弹都顺利运达了目的地。技术祭司们向万机之神献上了祈祷，在至高的献祭之中引爆了炸弹。那艘巨型舰船的毁灭过程，就算是在星轨上，用肉眼来看，恐怕也能看得很清楚吧。

languages.text: L'Omnimessie veillait sur eux, ce jour-là : toutes les charges ont atteint leurs cibles. Tout en amorçant les explosifs pour un ultime sacrifice, les technoprêtres ont adressé leurs prières au Dieu-Machine. La destruction du puissant croiseur a certainement été visible à l'œil nu depuis l'orbite.
languages.original_text: The Omnissiah watched over them that day — every charge reached its target. The Tech-Priests offered prayers to the Machine God as they activated the charges in their final act of sacrifice. I imagine one could see the death of the mighty cruiser from orbit with the naked eye.

traits.locale_text: L'Omnimessie veillait sur eux, ce jour-là : toutes les charges sont arrivées à destination. Tout en amorçant les explosifs pour un ultime sacrifice, les technoprêtres ont adressé leurs prières au Dieu-Machine. La destruction du puissant croiseur a certainement été visible à l'œil nu depuis l'orbite.

languages.text: その日、万機神は彼らを見守った。そして、すべての突撃部隊が目的地に到着した。技術司祭たちは最後の犠牲として、チャージを起動させながら機械神に祈りを捧げた。軌道上から肉眼でも、この強力な巡洋艦の死を見ることができただろう。
languages.original_text: The Omnissiah watched over them that day — every charge reached its target. The Tech-Priests offered prayers to the Machine God as they activated the charges in their final act of sacrifice. I imagine one could see the death of the mighty cruiser from orbit with the naked eye.

traits.locale_text: その日、万機神は彼らを見守った。そして、すべての突撃部隊が目的地に到着した。技術司祭たちは最後の犠牲として、チャージを起動させながら機械神に祈りを捧げた。軌道上から肉眼でも、この強力な巡洋艦の死を見ることができただろう。

languages.text: El Omnissiah velaba por ellos aquel día: todas las cargas alcanzaron a sus objetivos. Los tecnosacerdotes rezaron al Dios Máquina mientras activaban las cargas en un sacrificio final. Tengo entendido que la destrucción del imponente crucero fue visible desde la órbita sin necesidad de equipo especializado.
languages.original_text: The Omnissiah watched over them that day — every charge reached its target. The Tech-Priests offered prayers to the Machine God as they activated the charges in their final act of sacrifice. I imagine one could see the death of the mighty cruiser from orbit with the naked eye.

traits.locale_text: El Omnissiah velaba por ellos aquel día: todas las cargas llegaron a su destino. Los tecnosacerdotes rezaron al Dios Máquina mientras activaban las cargas en un sacrificio final. Tengo entendido que la destrucción del imponente crucero fue visible desde la órbita sin necesidad de equipo especializado.

languages.text: Der Omnissiah wachte an jenem Tag über sie — alle Ladungen erreichten ihr Ziel. Die Techpriester beteten zum Maschinengott, während sie in einem letzten Akt der Selbstaufopferung die Ladungen aktivierten. Man konnte den Tod des mächtigen Kreuzers vermutlich mit dem nackten Auge aus dem Orbit sehen.
languages.original_text: The Omnissiah watched over them that day — every charge reached its target. The Tech-Priests offered prayers to the Machine God as they activated the charges in their final act of sacrifice. I imagine one could see the death of the mighty cruiser from orbit with the naked eye.

traits.locale_text: Der Omnissiah wachte an jenem Tag über sie — alle Ladungen erreichten ihr Ziel. Die Techpriester beteten zum Maschinengott, während sie in einem letzten Akt der Selbstaufopferung die Ladungen aktivierten. Man konnte den Tod des mächtigen Kreuzers vermutlich mit dem nackten Auge aus dem Orbit sehen.

languages.text: Hermesih o gün sevgili kullarını gözetmiş olacak ki her bir bomba, hedefine ulaştı. Tekno Rahipler kendilerini feda edip bombaları aktifleştirirken Makine Tanrı'ya dualarını sundular. Bu kudretli geminin ölümü, yörüngeden çıplak gözle görülebilirdi diye düşünüyorum.
languages.original_text: The Omnissiah watched over them that day — every charge reached its target. The Tech-Priests offered prayers to the Machine God as they activated the charges in their final act of sacrifice. I imagine one could see the death of the mighty cruiser from orbit with the naked eye.
